name: Roots of the Wych Elm
description:
In the center of the village sits an ancient wych elm, gnarled, twisted, and hungry. Every cycle, someone in town must be Given to the wych elm...or else. The one who decides which neighbor to Give is you.

As village chief, you walk around town, get to know the citizens, and when you’re ready, you choose who you will Give to the wych elm from the people you talked to. Different choices mean different narrative outcomes. Will you reach the root of the mystery of the wych elm?

Created in a weekend for the 2023 Global Game Jam.

John Gale - Lead Designer

Andrew Goodwin - Music 

Fonts

Witch by Blackletter Studio

https://www.dafont.com/witch-2.font

AM Type1 by A. M.

https://www.dafont.com/am-type1.font

RPG Maker MV Plugins

Galv's Picture Animations by Galv
